Posts.Content: Jan 13, 2009 06:52PM hoppersmokey wrote: I just wanted to say you all have such courage.  I currently at the wait and see stage.  I have 2 boys 2 and 4 and a girl 8.  I can't imagine what I will tell them if it is cancer.  My mom died of cancer when I was at university and it was hard to watch someone go through that.  Its great to hear that while you struggle with breast cancer life still happens and mommies we keep on being. thanks for the inspiraion.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed 3 months after giving birth to my second child kelty kelty
